entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 42 %

Wind: ENE 9 km/h

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
